titles.title: I will run to the Lord my God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will run to the Lord my God, My rock and my salvation
I will run to the Lord my God my help
I will run to the Lord my God, my strength in time of trouble

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I won't retreat
My God does not retreat
I won't let go
My God does not
He holds us in his hands
He holds us in his hands

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will not fear
My God is not afraid
i won't hold back
my God does not
He holds us in His hands,
He holds us in his hands

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Fear not, I am with you
Fear not, I go before you
Fear not, I am with you
I go before you... (repeat)
